backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for products, carts, wishlists, lookbook images, sessions, and site content along with comparison utilities and access-control initialization. Mostly contains data models and module structures for the e‑commerce actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend security improvement for admin login input trimming and accurate error handling, listing affected files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, styles, and admin interfaces.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment configuration file containing WhatsApp checkout number and placeholders for additional variables.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables for light/dark modes, global styles, and design tokens using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React application entry point inside a single #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application controlling routing via History API, initializing React Query, and rendering all customer and admin pages based on URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageBa: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting homepage banners with form handling and mutations.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component handling admin session checks, trimmed email/password login, logout, and navigation rendering for admin pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, branding, and social icons, calling onNavigate for internal navigation. Includes dynamic year, logo, and structured link groups.
frontend/src/components/GuestMergePrompt: A modal prompt asking users whether to merge guest cart or wishlist items into their account. Supports confirm and skip actions with item count messaging.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with navigation, search, theme toggle, mobile menu, and cart/wishlist counts. Uses guest data, admin detection, and onNavigate routing.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageBan: Displays rotating homepage banners with navigation controls and click handling based on banner destinations.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageSec: Renders homepage content sections with titles, images, and text, plus a button linking to the About page.
frontend/src/components/MediaSlotUploade: Image uploader component allowing upload, replacement, and removal of images with progress tracking. Wraps ExternalBlob handling and previews the current image.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image hover swap, quick view, add-to-cart, and wishlist actions. Navigates to product page and shows product badges.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: A simple rich text editor with formatting toolbar using execCommand. Syncs HTML content with parent and supports placeholders and focus styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a reactive backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login state using the backend actor and stores session info with React Query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestCart.ts: Handles guest cart state with add, remove, and clear operations persisted to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestWishlist.ts: Manages a guest wishlist with add, remove, and clear functions stored in local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageBanners.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating homepage banners with admin-session checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/clear helpers, and initializes identities via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for products, cart, and admin product management with actor-based backend calls and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Hooks to fetch and update site content, including publishing changes and toggling dark mode with admin validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeMode.ts: Manages light/dark theme state based on user override or site settings, applying CSS classes and persisting user choice.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables, gold accents, utilities, and imported serif fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and rendering the root App.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page showing mission, values, and images describing the brand’s focus on pilgrimage essentials.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Computes category stats from products and provides searchable, sortable category management.
Shows admin stats for products, lookbook images, categories, and inventory value with quick navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLookbook.t: Manages lookbook images with search, sorting, editing, and image upload functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProducts.t: Admin interface for listing, filtering, sorting, creating, editing, and deleting products with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessions.t: Static admin page displaying privacy info and placeholders for session and cart analytics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for managing site content, drafts, publishing, dark mode, and homepage banners.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Cart page displaying guest cart items, product details, totals, and navigation with remove-item functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page that builds an order summary from the guest cart and enables WhatsApp-based order submission.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders the contact page with hero text, dynamic contact info, and a non-functional contact form. Pulls rich text contact details from site content hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the storefront home page with a hero section, category cards, and product sections using fetched products. Supports navigation via provided callback.
frontend/src/pages/Lookbook.tsx: Shows a grid of lookbook images with product tags and a dialog for detailed viewing. Fetches lookbook images and products, enabling navigation to product pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Implements product listing with category, type, usage, and sorting filters using fetched products. Supports clearing/toggling filters and navigating to product details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Displays detailed product info with image gallery, size/color selection, and add-to-cart/wishlist actions. Uses product and wishlist queries with mutation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/Returns.tsx: Displays return and exchange policies with cards and detailed instructions.
frontend/src/pages/Shipping.tsx: Shows shipping times, packaging details, tracking, and policy information.
frontend/src/pages/Wishlist.tsx: Loads wishlist items, handles loading/empty states, and displays saved products.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Utility to classify backend admin auth errors into stable types for UI messaging.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing admin authentication state in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/bannerDestination.ts: Encodes, decodes, and handles navigation actions for banner destination metadata.
frontend/src/utils/bannerEncoding.ts: Provides JSON-based encoding and decoding for banner text content.
frontend/src/utils/localCart.ts: Manages guest cart persistence with versioning and BigInt-safe quantity handling.
frontend/src/utils/localWishlist.ts: Manages guest wishlist persistence with versioning in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/siteContentDefaults.t: Defines fallback default values for site content, including hero text and contact details.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontNav.ts: Defines storefront navigation structure and homepage category cards with category filters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session-stored parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp checkout URL by formatting cart item details and total into an encoded message, with phone normalization.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, container settings, plugins, and extended utilities for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including version, issues, feature requests, and architectural notes for the admin login fix.
